meanings.definition: The state of being interconnected or interrelated.
meanings.sent1: The interconnectednesses of the ecosystem ensure the survival of all species.
meanings.sent2: The internet demonstrates the interconnectednesses of information across the globe.
meanings.sent3: The interconnectednesses of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent4: The interconnectednesses of the characters in the story created a web of relationships.
meanings.sent5: The interconnectednesses of the gears in the clockwork made it function smoothly.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being interconnected.
meanings.sent1: The beauty of the artwork lies in its interconnectednesses of colors and shapes.
meanings.sent2: The success of the project depended on the interconnectednesses of team members.
meanings.sent3: The interconnectednesses of the roads in the city led to traffic congestion.
meanings.sent4: The interconnectednesses of melodies and harmonies created a symphony of sound.
meanings.sent5: The interconnectednesses of the ingredients in the recipe resulted in a delicious dish.

meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the interconnectednesses of the ecosystem to understand its balance.
meanings.sent2: The philosopher pondered the interconnectednesses of all living beings.
meanings.sent3: The interconnectednesses of the plot twists in the movie kept the audience engaged.
meanings.sent4: The interconnectednesses of history and culture shape our present society.
meanings.sent5: The interconnectednesses of technology and communication have revolutionized the world.
